Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of Hillsdale Memorial Park.
Room.LongDescription: Dillsdale Memorial Park is used primarily by Oceancrest officials to deliver messages to the people. The park, located east of the Oceancrest Ministry of Truth, is designed for official gatherings and some public announcements. It can also be reserved for weddings and other festive occasions if you have the right connections.
